arguments.response_text: One of my family's favorite cultural traditions is celebrating St. Patrick's Day. We usually make a great dinner that night, corned beef, cabbage, potatoes, well I don't really like cabbage but the rest of it is great and we listen to great Irish music and it's just always a really great time and very special.
arguments.response_summary: The text describes a family's celebration of St. Patrick's Day, including their dinner and music.
arguments.matched_prompt: What are your favorite cultural traditions?
